statements: UPDATE Vehicle_Details SET make='Toyota', model='Camry', year=2020, vin='12345678901234567' WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE Vehicle_Details SET year=2018, vin='98765432109876543', make='Honda', model='Civic' WHERE vehicle_id=2;
UPDATE Vehicle_Details SET year = 2019, model = 'Civic' WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;
UPDATE Vehicle_Details SET make = 'Tesla', vin = 'ABCDEFG12345678901' WHERE vehicle_id = 5678;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET model='SUV', year=2022 WHERE make='Honda';
UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity=20, location='Warehouse A' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET year = 2020, model = 'SUV' WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND vin = '123ABC';
UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = 10, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET year = 2020, model = 'SUV' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vehicle_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET year = 2022, make = 'Toyota', model = 'Camry' WHERE vin = 'ABC123456789DEF01';
UPDATE vehicle_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE vehicle_id = (SELECT id FROM vehicle_details WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Camry');
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2015, vin = 'ABC1234567890' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10, price = 2500.00 WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2022, vin = 'ABC123456789XYZ' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 15000.50, quantity = 10 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2021 WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Camry';
UPDATE vehicle_inventory SET price = 15000.50, quantity = 10 WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2021, vin = 'Z59A8B3CX6QPB2O9L' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE vehicle_inventory SET quantity = 10, price = 25000.00 WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
